stimulusHtml: The port of Los Angeles is the busiest port in the United States and a major break-of-bulk point. Which of the following statements correctly explains why Los Angeles is a break-of-bulk point?
choicesHtml: The robotic systems at the port results in fewer workers being required to unload container ships.
The port can accommodate large container ships that can be unloaded quickly so that containers can be transferred onto carriers that use Californiaâ€™s highway and rail systems.
The massive warehouses located at the port allow goods from container ships to be stored easily for long periods of time.
Goods can be transferred to other container ships going to the port of San Francisco.
Los Angeles is on the Pacific Ocean allowing for more trade with countries in Asia.
